sentences.cn: 阿丑道:“大伯伯, 什么叫‘关系’? ”
“ 没错, 没错, ” 大儿子说.

sentences.en: Eldest Uncle, he had two popsicles. "
sentences.cn: 大伯伯, 他有两根棒冰. ”

sentences.en: He was the eldest of six children.
sentences.cn: 六个孩子当中他是老大。

sentences.en: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.cn: 他的长子约瑟夫继承了乃父的传统。

sentences.en: In fright Ah Hsiung yelled for Eldest Uncle to rescue him.
sentences.cn: 阿凶慌得叫大伯伯解围.

sentences.en: The burden fell on the eldest son.
The castle and the land are entailed on the eldest son.
sentences.cn: 城堡和土地限定由长子继承.

sentences.en: The house and estate are entailed on the eldest daughter.
sentences.cn: 这所房子和地产限定由长女继承.

sentences.en: The King's eldest son is the heir to the throne.
sentences.cn: 国王的长子是王位的继承人.

sentences.en: The property is the birthright of the eldest child.
sentences.cn: 长子享有财产的继承权。

sentences.en: The two eldest are already doing well at Kings Wood.
sentences.cn: 年纪最长的两个现在已经在金斯伍德念书，成绩都不错。

sentences.en: Then the eldest son muttered a curse and jumped to his feet.
sentences.cn: 这时,大儿子低声骂了一句,霍地站了起来.

sentences.en: Warren's eldest son is an art student, at St Martin's.
sentences.cn: 沃伦的大儿子是圣马丁学院艺术系的学生。

trans.tran_cn: 最年长的，最老的，年事最高的(old的最高级)
trans.tran_en: the eldest of a group of people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
